Fayetteville.Fayetteville State University:
Fayetteville State University (FSU) is a historically black public regional university in Fayetteville, North Carolina, United States. FSU is part of the University of North Carolina System and the Thurgood Marshall College Fund. 


== History ==
The institution that would become Fayetteville State University and be recognized as the second oldest state supported school in North Carolina had humble yet promising beginnings.
